tidytacos 1.0.3

Aggregate taxa on a given taxonomic rank

Source: R/handlers.R
aggregate_taxa.Rd

There are two ways to call this function:

Usage

aggregate_taxa(ta, rank = NULL)

Arguments

ta

A tidytacos object.

rank

An optional rank to aggregate on.

Value

A tidytacos object.

Details

  • If the rank you are interested in is in the standard list, just supply it as an argument.

  • If not, delete all taxon variables except taxon_id and the ranks you are still interested in prior to calling this function.

Examples

urt %>% aggregate_taxa(rank = "class")
#> $samples
#> # A tibble: 217 × 9
#>    run    condition participant location method plate passes_qc sample sample_id
